video_prompt: A fluffy orange kitten shifts its weight on a shimmering pile of gold coins. Its eyes blink, whiskers twitch, and the suspended gold coin gently rotates. The golden glow surrounding the kitten and coins subtly pulses, while golden specks in the smoky background drift and shimmer.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical shot: Adorable fluffy orange kitten sits regally on a large pile of glistening gold coins. Dramatic lighting with a bright golden glow behind the kitten and coins, creating a halo effect around the kitten. Kitten has large, dark, curious eyes and visible whiskers. A single glowing gold coin floats in front of its chest. Vibrant, reflective gold coins are densely packed, with bokeh effect on background coins. Dark, smoky background with sparkling golden specks and out-of-focus golden circles. Cute, opulent, and magical.
refined_video_prompt: The orange kitten subtly shifts its weight; its eyes blink, and whiskers twitch. The gold coins beneath it glint and gently resettle. A suspended gold coin slowly rotates. A golden glow softly pulses around the kitten and coins, while golden specks in the background steadily drift and shimmer.
